events.message: The applicant submitted a personal loan application to cover medical expenses and consolidate existing debts.
The application was categorized under Personal Loan based on the stated purpose of medical bills and debt repayment.
Assigned loan officer Emily Richards to manage the personal loan application and communicate with the applicant.
Initial review conducted; verified basic applicant information and loan purpose but requested more documents.
Requested medical bills, proof of income, and credit history documents to proceed with risk assessment.
Applicant submitted all requested documents including medical invoices, recent pay slips, and credit reports.
Completed credit check showing a moderate credit score with some outstanding debt to be monitored.
Risk analysis completed with moderate risk level due to current debts but stable income was noted.
Presented a personal loan offer with terms including a 7% interest rate and a two-year repayment period.
Applicant responded positively and requested clarification on early repayment penalties and installment amounts.
Escalated application to senior credit officer for review due to applicant's questions about loan conditions.
Loan officially approved after all requirements and clarifications were satisfactorily addressed by the team.
Funds disbursed to the applicantâ€™s account to cover the medical expenses and debt consolidation as planned.
Followed up with the applicant to ensure receipt of funds and to provide support for repayment options.
The loan application process was officially closed with all documentation complete and funding confirmed.
